snippet: Dr. Leaf was a physician, researcher, administrator and professor who studied heart disease, longevity and the dangers of global warming.
abstract: Alexander Leaf, versatile physician and research scientist who was an early advocate of diet and exercise to prevent heart disease, and who helped scientifically establish the dangers global warming poses to the human species, dies at age 92.
lead_paragraph: Dr. Leaf was a physician, researcher, administrator and professor who studied heart disease, longevity and the dangers of global warming.

headline.seo: Alexander Leaf Dies at 92; Linked Diet and Health
headline.main: Alexander Leaf Dies at 92; Linked Diet and Health
headline.print_headline: Alexander Leaf, 92, Dies; Linked Diet and Health
